response.original_title: Hopelessly in Love: Anna Nicole Smith and Larry Birkhead
response.overview: A revealing account of the relationship between one of the most infamous women in the world, Anna Nicole Smith, and Larry Birkhead, the celebrity photographer who saw her beyond her inauspicious past. Birkhead gives a firsthand recollection of their tumultuous and unstable union, which ignited a highly-publicized paternity battle between Larry and four of Anna Nicole’s lovers following Anna Nicole’s grievous overdose.
response.title: Hopelessly in Love: Anna Nicole Smith and Larry Birkhead
